description:
This record documents the harvest of a ripe papaya from the backyard garden at MaMeeFarmâ„¢.

At 12:25 (24 December 2025), a mature papaya fruit was manually harvested for on-site food consumption.

and the physical state of produce at harvest time.

Recorded under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework as ground-truth agricultural and subsistence activity, without narrative interpretation or emotional framing.
